document_data.name: Utahraptor
document_data.mainbody: '''Utahraptors''' were a large species of carnivorous [[dinosaur]]s found in [[Chult]].
document_data.Description: Similar in appearance to [[deinonychus]] but much larger, utahraptors stood upright on two legs with a large tail for balance. They had {{SI|12|in}} claws on their feet, as well as razor-sharp teeth and arms ending in {{SI|10|in}} long claws. They had excellent natural camouflage, with brown skin with green striping.
document_data.Combat: An attacking utahraptor was vicious and brutal. Their teeth and claws caused horrible damage. The claws on their feet were sharp enough to eviscerate a creature. They were strong and agile. They used their camouflage to attack prey in ambush attacks. Their legs were very powerful, allowing them to leap up to {{SI|15|ft}} high, up to {{SI|40|ft}} if they had a running start. They had a natural immunity to ''[[fear]]''-based spells.
document_data.Society: Utahraptors were pack animals. Their packs were matriarchal, with the strongest and largest female as leader. They co-operated with each other and coordinated their attacks. They were territorial and very protective of their young.
document_data.Ecology: Utahraptors lived in dense forests or jungles. Their diet consisted purely of meat.
